Submodules¶

app.util.raw_helpers module¶

app.util.raw_helpers.get_id()[source]¶

generates BSON ObjectID

Returns:string representation of a ObjectID
app.util.raw_helpers.raw_article_exists(target_hash, target_db)[source]¶

returns number of articles in raw with a hash

Parameters:target_hash – hash to check against
Returns:count of articles with target_hash
app.util.raw_helpers.store_json_to_file(contents, filename)[source]¶

stores a JSON file to local storage

Parameters:
  • contents – Contents of JSON to be stored
  • filename – Filename contents will be saved to

app.util.s3_tools module¶

app.util.s3_tools.get_file(bucket, filename)[source]¶

retrieves and returns an s3 key

Parameters:
  • bucket – bucket file is in
  • filename – key file is stored in
Returns:

key instance
app.util.s3_tools.store_file(desired_bucket, filename, payload)[source]¶

adds a file to a specified S3 bucket

Parameters:
  • bucket – destination bucket
  • filename – desired filename
  • payload – contents of file
Returns:

boolean of success or failure
